level.heading: FREE MEETINGS FOR P.T.A., CIVIC, AND CITIZEN GROUPS (ยง 19-727)

level.text: Permits for special uses of school facilities and of field houses shall be issued to recognized organizations for regular meetings and specific activities in accordance with regulations agreed upon by the Department, the Board of Education, the National Capital Parks Office, and the housing authorities.

The Department shall annually defray the expense of custodial services for evening business meetings in school or recreation buildings or field houses not to exceed eight (8) citizens or civic organizations, and four (4) for a parent-teacher association.
